type."}}},"LocationID":{"type":"object","title":"Location ID","description":"Identifier for the location.","required":["value"],"properties":{"value":{"type":"string","title":"Location ID customer.","required":["value"],"properties":{"value":{"type":"string","title":"Customer ID Value","description":"The value of the Customer ID."}}}}}}}

measure."}}},"TaxCategory":{"type":"object","title":"Tax Category","description":"The tax category for the inventory item.","properties":{"value":{"type":"string","title":"Tax Category Manager Value","description":"The value of the product manager."}}},"SalesUnit":{"type":"object","title":"Sales Unit of Measure","description":"The unit of measure used for class."}}},"DefaultWarehouse":{"type":"object","title":"Default Warehouse","description":"The default warehouse for the inventory item.","properties":{"value":{"type":"string","title":"Default Warehouse Value","description":"The value of the default warehouse."}}},"InventoryID":{"type":"object","title":"Inventory ID","description":"The unique identifier for the inventory item.","properties":{"value":{"type":"string","title":"Inventory ID Value","description":"The value of the Inventory ID."}}}}}}}
